There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around November 19th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was about 6pm the light just appeared directly over house out of no where. we was sitting around a fire in the backyard. it was just sitting there for a few seconds then headed north. it wasnt very high in the sky and just glowed very brightly. as it was getting close to the tree line it was approached by a plane at about an 11:00 angle. then light the rapidly dimmed and was out of sight just as the planed approached it. about 20 mins later it reappeared over the house very high up this time it was following a plane headed south when it got too close to the plane it dimmed. we have a video of this. about 15 mins later the light then was sighted very very high up coming from the west but headed north on the same path as the first time it was sighted. about 20 mins later it was spotted again headed south the same very very high up as the last time viewed. each time it was witnessed it was directly over the backyard.
